# Share Structure

## Share Structure

Capital Structure| NASDAQ:EU | TSX.V:EU  
---|---  
Market Capitalization (@ $3.78 USD)| $700,609,429 USD  
Shares Issued & Outstanding| 185,336,410  
Warrants**| 20,491,084  
Stock Options| 8,931,472  
Fully Diluted**| 214,768,966  
Cash| $46,000,000 USD  
Marketable Securities| $21,000,000 USD  
Uranium – Net at Conversion Facility| 157,000 lbs  
Uranium – Drummed Awaiting Shipment| 63,000 lbs  
  
As of November 18th, 2024 ** Fully Diluted: assumes full exercise of options and warrants 

### Warrants

May 14, 2025| $3.25| 56,369  
---|---|---  
May 14, 2025| $3.91| 75  
February 8, 2026| $4.05| 3,835,440  
February 14, 2026| $3.75| 16,609,200
